rows.label: qst102205_msg0001
rows.name: I'm glad you're safe! I was worried.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0002
rows.name:
The ingredients... they're
perfect! Thank you.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll start cooking right away. I'm
pretty confident in my skills.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0101
rows.name:
I might have made a bit too
much... There's still some left.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0102
rows.name:
You want seconds? That's
great to hear! This Gulan
spice is amazing, isn't it?

rows.label: qst102205_msg0103
rows.name:
If you wrap-bake fish and
fruit with this spice, it's
almost always delicious.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0104
rows.name: An old comrade of mine taught me that.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0105
rows.name: This recipe is like a memento of them.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0106
rows.name:
I was out gathering ingredients,
just like you were today.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0005
rows.name:
I was young and full of energy...
and before I knew it, I had wandered
into a monster's territory.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0006
rows.name:
I frantically ran back to the
camp to get help, but...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0007
rows.name:
We were in an area with few
monsters, so everyone had
let their guard down...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0008
rows.name:
The only one who survived was
me, because I was armed.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0009
rows.name:
I wonder if it would have been better if
I hadn't returned to the camp... if the
monsters had just eaten me instead.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0010
rows.name: ...I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0011
rows.name:
To talk about something like
this during our break...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0012
rows.name:
I was hoping you'd tell me
stories about Vandham-san.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0013
rows.name:
Well, it looks like Corden-san
has finished eating.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0014
rows.name:
Let's go ask him about the
details of our next mission.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0015
rows.name:
After that's done, I want you to
tell me your stories about fighting
alongside Vandham-san, I promise!
